ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in years at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Sex of the subject, assgined at birth
The ascii keyboard key pressed for each response

Notes: useful for determining runtime as well as whether subject idles during task

ElementDescription: Returns ms delay in montor onsent for each block of the experiment
Denotes if the block is practice or the experiment.
Returns the number of responses within each block.

Notes: The practice block is denoted using -1.

ElementDescription: Returns the trial number across the experimental blocks.
